translations.english: The soldiers cursed. The emperor was angry.
The city surrendered. The cursing soldiers were executed.

translations.chinese: 諸縣堅守不 降反寇者，復租賦三歲。
translations.english: The various counties that firmly defended and did not surrender to the rebel bandits had their taxes and levies exempted for three years.

translations.chinese: 春正月，淮陰侯韓信謀反長安，夷三族。
translations.english: In the first month of spring, Marquis of Huaiyin Han Xin plotted rebellion at Chang'an and his three clans were exterminated.

translations.chinese: 將軍柴武斬韓王信於參合。
translations.english: General Chai Wu beheaded King Han Xin at Canhe.
